titleStmt.title: Directions at large, and cautionary, touching the proper use of those famous pills called Dr. De-Laun's head-pills many years composed, and sold in Black-Friers, London: also the nature of them, and the occasion of this their publication. Set forth by Michael Belke, physician.
titleStmt.author: Belke, Michael.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
